{{Actor| | type = Interactive object | name = Headless winged statue | class = ZWingedStatueNoSkull | game = Hexen | doomednum = 9011 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SwitchableDecoration|SwitchableDecoration]]→[[Classes:SwitchingDecoration|SwitchingDecoration]]→ZWingedStatueNoSkull
A statue of a headless gargoyle. The player must find [[Classes:PuzzSkull|Yorick's skull]] and place it on the statue. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR ZWingedStatueNoSkull : {{Class|SwitchingDecoration}} { {{Property|Radius}} 10 {{Property|Height}} 62 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: STWN A -1 Stop Active: STWN B -1 Stop } }
